title: Rocky Mountain Bikes sharpens their Instincts for evolving trail performance
content:
Thereâ€™s something to be said about one bike that can do it all. Rocky Mountain Bikes is continuing to streamline their models, and the updated Instinct now serves as their most versatile, mid-travel trail bike. With 140/150mm of travel and re-tuned Smoothlink suspension, RMB has revised the Instinct to eat up miles of trail while […]

author: Steve Fisher
